definition: Xuan Yuan, personal name of Huangdi, the Yellow Emperor 黃帝|黄帝[Huang2 di4]
two-character surname Xuanyuan
pavilion with a view/high/tall/high fronted, curtained carriage (old)
surname Xuan
shafts of cart/yamen
alternative name for the Yellow Emperor 黃帝|黄帝
Regulus (constellation)

sentences.english: Regulus is the brightest star in the constellation Leo.
sentences.chinese: 軒轅十四是獅子座中最亮的星星。

sentences.english: Huangshan in the Jin dynasty, when Buddhism introduced, under the peak Regulus Regulus temple was built.
sentences.chinese: 佛教在晉朝時傳入黃山，軒轅峯下曾建有軒­轅古剎。

sentences.chinese: 這功夫，軒轅青龍便和玉清真人一起走進了前殿。

sentences.english: So, I'll give a lecture titled《I Commend My Heart to the Lofty Thill》.
sentences.chinese: 爲此，我作如下演講，題目是《我以我心薦軒轅》。

sentences.english: Silvery-blue Regulus may look pinkish in the twilight.
sentences.chinese: 黃昏中散發着銀藍光輝的軒轅十四略呈雪青色。

sentences.english: Silvery -blue Regulus may look pinkish in the twilight.
sentences.chinese: 銀藍色的軒轅十四在暮色裏有一點點淺桃色。

sentences.english: Ever does natural beauty steal in like air , and envelope great actions.
sentences.chinese: 大自然的美就像空氣一樣，與卓越的行爲不分軒轅。

sentences.english: Yuan temple's main hall Yellow Emperor placed among the memorial tablets.
sentences.chinese: 軒轅廟內的大殿中間放有黃帝的牌位。

sentences.chinese: 軒轅劍3外傳天之痕點開始遊戲後彈出？

sentences.chinese: 希炎身後就是路修，他背上始終伏着軒轅小可。

sentences.english: Xuanyuan Sinan exerted a decisive function in the legendary war of Yellow Emperor against Chi You.
sentences.chinese: 黃帝戰蚩尤神話中軒轅司南起了決定性作用。
